name: Admiral's Hat
effect: Hero sea movement, No penalty for boat boarding/diembarking, Summon Boat Spell, Scuttle Boat Spell, Movement converted between land and sea, Protects army in whirlpools

name: Angelic Alliance
effect: All primary skills +21, No alignment penalty, Prayer in combat

name: Armageddon's Blade
effect: Attack +3, Defense +3, Knowledge +6, Spell Power +3, Armageddon Spell expert, Immune to Armageddon

name: Armor of the Damned
effect: Attack +3, Defense +3, Spell Power +2, Knowledge +2, Following Spells on enemies: Slow, Curse, Weakness, Misfortune

name: Arms of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 5th lvl units by 2 per week in that town

name: Bow of the Sharpshooter
effect: No range and obstacle penalty, No melee penalty

name: Cloak of the Undead King
effect: Necromancy +60%, From dead allies, 30% are resurrected as Skeletons. If a hero already has the Necromancy skill then the percentages are added to the skill and the level of skill determines what type is resurrected: Basic – Walking Dead; Advanced – Wights; Expert – Liches

name: Head of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 6th lvl units by 1 per week in that town

name: Hourglass of the Evil Hour
effect: Negates luck bonuses during combat for both sides

name: Legs of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 2nd lvl units by 5 per week in that town
